# 解析卷积神经网络——深度学习实践手册

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/jiexi-juanji-shenjingwangluo-shendu-xuexi-shijian-shouce
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/jiexi-juanji-shenjingwangluo-shendu-xuexi-shijian-shouce
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install jiexi-juanji-shenjingwangluo-shendu-xuexi-shijian-shouce
jiexi-juanji-shenjingwangluo-shendu-xuexi-shijian-shouce <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g jiexi-juanji-shenjingwangluo-shendu-xuexi-shijian-shouce
jiexi-juanji-shenjingwangluo-shendu-xuexi-shijian-shouce <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
